com.st.BlueSTSDK

Class ConfigControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.ConfigControl

  • public class ConfigControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manage the Config characteristics

    The class provides the read and write functions to access the registers throws the Command class

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    STMicroelectronics - Central Labs.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Field Detail

      • sThreadPool

        protected static final java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService sThreadPool
        pool of thread used for notify to the listeners that the feature have new data

      • mConfigControlListener

        protected final java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<ConfigControl.ConfigControlListener> mConfigControlListener
        list of listener for the feature change.

        is a thread safe list, so a listener can subscribe itself from a callback

        See Also:
        Feature.FeatureListener

      • ConfigControl

        public ConfigControl(Node node,
                     android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic regChar,
                     android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt connection)
        Parameters:
        node - node that will be configurate
        regChar - characteristics used for access to the register
        connection - connection with the node

    • Method Detail

      • addConfigListener

        public void addConfigListener(ConfigControl.ConfigControlListener listener)
        add a new listener for the update of this feature
        Parameters:
        listener - listener class

      • removeConfigListener

        public void removeConfigListener(ConfigControl.ConfigControlListener listener)
        remove a listener for the update of this feature
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to remove

      • characteristicsUpdate

        public void characteristicsUpdate(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        call the method onRegisterReadResult or onRegisterWriteResult for each listener that subscribe to this feature.

        each call will be run in a different thread

        if you extend the method update you have to call this method after that you update the data

        Parameters:
        characteristic - byte read from the register

      • characteristicsWriteUpdate

        public void characteristicsWriteUpdate(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                       boolean success)
        call the method onRequestResult for each listener that subscribe to this feature.

        each call will be run in a different thread

        if you extend the method update you have to call this method after that you update the data

        Parameters:
        characteristic - that contains the data command sent to the device
        success - true if the wrote command is send correctly

      • read

        public void read(Command cmd)
        Parameters:
        cmd - read command

      • write

        public void write(Command cmd)
        Parameters:
        cmd - write command

      • setMode

        public void setMode(Node.Mode mode)
